ComicInfo.Summary: When Terry meets with Spawn to plan their mission, he tries to understand his friend's chosen hideout as well as their new-found friendship. When he stumbles onto the worms, Al's reaction confuses even more. Terry and Al carry out their mission to document Wynn's involvement in the arms trade. Upon seeing the evidence, Al sends an explosive message to implicate and endanger Wynn's global network infrastructure.
ComicInfo.Title: Sabotage
